summary: It's a crossbow replace mod base on Ghosu-PFL
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a replace mod for crossbow & dwarven crossbow, all meshes、most textures is my own work ,and I add new gun shot & impact sound .
Other work (like scripts file) is Ghosu's work

Here we got two different style firearm to replace crossbow.
1.The crossbow is replace by a" Cap lock rifle" with socket bayonet, the bolt bag is all new meshes with bayonet 's scabbard.

2.THe dwarven crossbow is replace by a"Needle gun" style rifle with a Schwyz 1957 bayonet, it got new bolt bag & scabbard too.

The Schwyz 1957 bayonet had a stand alone version, click [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67114/?tab=3&selected_game=110&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fid%3D67114%26user%3D1%26gid%3D110&pUp=1]Here[/url]
author: MartinRamWu
